item.title: デンバー・ポスト紙の元記者たちが立ち上げた5年前の営利デジタルニュース組織「コロラド・サン」が非営利モデルへ（Dan Kennedy/Nieman Lab）
item.description:
Dan Kennedy / Nieman Lab:
The Colorado Sun, a five-year-old for-profit digital news organization launched by former The Denver Post journalists, moves toward a nonprofit model  —  “Whether I agree with it or not, whether I even like it or not, the reality is that many individuals, many institutions and philanthropic groups …

item.title: ニューヨークの年金基金がフォックスを提訴、2020年の米大統領選に絡む名誉毀損訴訟への道を開き、株主の義務を怠ったとして非難（ケイティ・ロバートソン／ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙）
item.description:
Katie Robertson / New York Times:
NYC's pension funds sue Fox, accusing the company of neglecting its shareholder duties by opening itself up to defamation lawsuits tied to the 2020 US election  —  The funds accuse the Fox Corporation board of neglecting its responsibility to shareholders by leaving the company open to defamation lawsuits.

item.title: エンデバーはWWEとUFCを統合してTKOグループを設立し、米国での権利契約では両者を別々にしておくが、世界的な権利契約では両者を一緒に活用する計画だ（Tim Baysinger/Axios）
item.description:
Tim Baysinger / Axios:
Endeavor combines the WWE with UFC to form TKO Group, and plans to keep the two separate in US rights deals but leverage them together for global rights deals  —  - Tim Baysinger, author of Axios Pro: Media Deals  —  Endeavor plans to keep UFC and WWE separate in U.S. rights deals …

item.title: 元NFLネットワーク記者のジム・トロッターが人種差別でNFLを提訴、NFLの多様性の欠如を訴えたのに契約が更新されなかったと主張（New York Times紙）
item.description:
New York Times:
Ex-NFL Network reporter Jim Trotter sues the NFL for racial discrimination, alleging his contract wasn't renewed after he called out the NFL's lack of diversity  —  Jim Trotter said his contract with the NFL Network was not renewed after he challenged Commissioner Roger Goodell and other executives …

item.title: The Sporting NewsがPlaytech主導で$15Mを調達、評価額は "8桁"; TSNは1886年に新聞社として設立され、2012年にデジタルオンリーとなった（Sara Fischer/Axios）
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
The Sporting News raised $15M led by Playtech, valuing the outlet in the “eight figures”; TSN was founded as a newspaper in 1886 and became digital-only in 2012  —  The Sporting News, a digital sports news site, has raised $15 million in a growth round led by Playtech, a London-based …

item.title: エコノミストは10月中旬、月額4.90ドルでエコノミストの全ポッドキャストに独占的にアクセスできる「Economist Podcasts+」の導入を計画している（Sara Fischer/Axios）
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
The Economist plans to introduce Economist Podcasts+, a tier that in mid-October will offer exclusive access to all of the Economist's podcasts for $4.90/month  —  The Economist plans to introduce a new subscription tier this Thursday called Economist Podcasts+ for $4.90 monthly, the Economist president Bob Cohn told Axios.

item.title: TikTokがTikTok Shopを米国全ユーザーに展開開始、アプリのホーム画面にユーザーをマーケットプレイスに送るボタンを追加、すでに20万人の売り手がいる（Sapna Maheshwari/New York Times）
item.description:
Sapna Maheshwari / New York Times:
TikTok begins rolling out TikTok Shop to all US users, adding a button to the app's home screen that sends users to a marketplace, and already has 200K sellers  —  The company is beginning to introduce TikTok Shop to all of the app's users in the U.S., hoping to add a major new revenue stream.

item.title: ハリー・スタイルズの "流出 "とされる楽曲がDiscordで販売されている中、ファンやAI分析会社は、そのクリップがAIによって生成されたものかどうかを判断するのに苦慮している（Jason Koebler/404 Media）。
item.description:
Jason Koebler / 404 Media:
As some supposedly “leaked” Harry Styles songs are being sold on Discord, fans and AI-analysis companies struggle to determine if the clips are AI-generated  —  Discord communities within the Harry Styles and One Direction fandom are tearing themselves apart over “leaked snippets” …

item.title: バークレイ一族への融資を再編するための10年にわたる努力が、いかにしてロイズ・バンキング・グループによるテレグラフ紙グループの支配権奪取に至ったか（フィナンシャル・タイムズ紙）
item.description:
Financial Times:
How a decade-long effort to restructure loans extended to the Barclay family culminated in Lloyds Banking Group seizing control of the Telegraph newspaper group  —  How a decade-long effort to restructure loans extended to the reclusive businessmen's empire culminated in Lloyds Banking Group seizing control of a national newspaper

item.title: レイオフ、資産売却、新たなパートナーシップを含むアポロのヤフー再建努力について情報筋が語る。
item.description:
Rachel Graf / The Information:
Sources describe Apollo's Yahoo turnaround efforts, including layoffs, asset sales, and new partnerships; Yahoo is on pace to generate $7B in 2023 gross revenue  —  When speaking about the company he inherited in September 2021, Jim Lanzone is remarkably blunt.

item.title: ニールセンのGracenoteがFASTプログラムを発表、コンテンツ会社がFASTチャンネルや番組を大手ストリーミングサービスで配信できるようにするためのもの（Georg Szalai/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Georg Szalai / The Hollywood Reporter:
Nielsen's Gracenote unveils the FAST Program, designed to help content companies get their FAST channels and programming distributed by major streaming services  —  Unveiled at IBC in Amsterdam, it promises “better FAST content visibility, consumption and monetization.”

item.title: MTVがSnapchatと提携し、3人のファイナリストが決まった時点で、ユーザーが特別なレンズを通じてVideo Music Awardsの最優秀新人アーティスト部門に投票できるようにする（Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Ivan Mehta / TechCrunch:
MTV partners with Snapchat to let users vote for the Video Music Awards' Best New Artist category through a special Lens, once the three finalists are decided  —  MTV has partnered with Snapchat to let users vote for a Video Music Awards category through Lenses.

item.title: ITVはディズニーとの複数年契約により、2024年から英国でアカデミー賞を放映する権利を獲得。
item.description:
Alex Ritman / The Hollywood Reporter:
ITV wins the rights to show the Oscars in the UK starting in 2024 in a multiyear deal with Disney, after Sky gave up the rights following a 20-year partnership  —  Sky has ended its 20-year run as the home of the Academy Awards.  —  The Academy Awards has a brand new home in the U.K.

item.title: オンラインクリエイターにとってかつてない好機となった理由：年収100万ドルを稼ぐのはかつてなく難しいかもしれないが、5万ドルを稼ぐのはかつてなく簡単だ（Hunter Walk）
item.description:
Hunter Walk:
Why there has never been a better time to be an online creator: it might be harder than ever to earn $1M per year, but it has never been easier to make $50K  —  I judge the health of the creator economy by one single controversial factor: ease of access and probability of survival for its participants.

item.title: プロのアーティストにより多くの印税を与えるUMGのDeezerとの契約は、他のメジャーレーベルやプラットフォームをストリーミングの新局面に引きずり込む可能性がある（Anna Nicolaou/Financial Times）。
item.description:
Anna Nicolaou / Financial Times:
How UMG's Deezer deal, which will give more royalty money to professional artists, could pull other major labels and platforms into a new phase of streaming  —  Universal's new deal on streaming royalties underscores how the major labels have remade themselves throughout the digital era
